column4: hi...making move from windows to linux...got ubuntu and downloaded a program from sourceforge (childsplay) as a zip file...i extra it to my desktop and now am not sure how to go about installing it...there is a file called install.sh on the newly created folder and when i click on it i get a window asking if i want to run it.  I click on "run" but nothing happens...any suggestions? p.s. sorry for the long posting...
so, why not just install the one in the repository?
that's because Ubuntu doesn't use (and locks) the root account
